data.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
data.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
Event Sched…

relatedRecords.description:
- - - -
6:00 - Arrivals and networking / 6:30 - Group exercise The NYC Scrum User Group meets monthly to talk about Scrum, to share experiences, to network, and to provide support for local Scrum practitioners. Interested in telling your own story? If you have an idea you would like to share, come…
